typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		num_order as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		modo_envio as string,
		cliente_id as string,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		region_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> TbOrdenes
source(output(
		{@id_modo} as string,
		{@Descripcion} as string,
		{@Tipo_x0020_ID} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ModoEnvio
source(output(
		{Region ID} as integer,
		{Region Desc} as string,
		{Detalle region} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> Regiones
Join2, ModoEnvio join(modo_envio == {@id_modo},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 select(mapColumn(
		num_order,
		fec_orden,
		fec_envio,
		id_modo_envio = modo_envio,
		cliente_id,
		imp_subtotal,
		region_id,
		{Region Desc},
		{Detalle region},
		modo_envio = {@Descripcion},
		id_Tipo_Envio = {@Tipo_x0020_ID}
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
TbOrdenes, Regiones join(region_id == {Region ID},
	joinType:'left',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join2
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		num_order as string,
		OrderId as string,
		fec_orden as date,
		fec_envio as date,
		imp_subtotal as double,
		id_modo as integer,
		modo_envio as string,
		ID_Tipo_envio as integer,
		descripcion_envio as string,
		Region_ID as integer,
		Region_descripcion as string,
		Detalle_Region as string,
		Codigo as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
